about_the_game:
SURVIVE IN SPACE

Dive into Astrometica Prologue, a free space survival adventure where you're tested against the cosmos's harshest environments. This prologue offers a taste of our full game, featuring innovative systems for battery management, vehicle operation, crafting, and research to enrich your gameplay. It's more than survival; it's about strategy, adaptation, and exploration in the vast unknown—now accessible for free. Welcome to your cosmic playground and battlefield. Embark on this journey and conquer the mysteries of space.

🌠COLLECT USEFUL RAW MATERIALS:

In Astrometica Prologue, the cosmos is rich with resources waiting to be discovered. You'll venture into the vast recesses of space and abandoned bases to collect dozens of raw materials, each integral to your survival and progression. Elevate your resource gathering with advanced technology: deploy drills to bore into the heart of asteroids and set up automatic miners, sophisticated machines designed to autonomously extract raw materials. This intricate system of resource collection not only fuels your journey but also immerses you in the role of a space pioneer, strategizing the best ways to utilize these assets for survival, crafting, and beyond. Embark on this adventure, where the wealth of the cosmos is yours to claim—all in the free prologue of Astrometica.

⚙️ CRAFTING AND TOOLS:

In Astrometica Prologue, crafting is at the core of survival and exploration. With the resources you gather from the depths of space, you have the power to craft essential tools for your journey. From drills that penetrate asteroid cores, to lasers that cut through the unknown, and base builders that allow you to establish your own corner in the cosmos—each tool is vital for survival. But it doesn’t stop there; modifications are available to enhance every tool’s efficiency and adaptability to the challenges you face.

Moreover, your survival kit can be expanded with crafted items crucial for enduring the harsh space environment. Shield modules to protect against cosmic hazards, oxygen tanks for extended ventures, and a jetpack to navigate the zero-gravity realms with ease. Each crafted item is designed to boost your capabilities—whether it’s speeding across asteroid fields, bolstering your defenses against unforeseen dangers, or expanding your carry capacity to hoard more resources.

Astrometica Prologue invites you to leverage these crafting opportunities to tailor your survival strategy. Strengthen your arsenal, optimize your gear, and ensure your survival in the sprawling universe of Astrometica. Your ingenuity and resourcefulness are your best allies in this grand space adventure.

🏗️ BASE BUILDING:

Base building in Astrometica Prologue transcends mere survival—it's about creating a stronghold that reflects your strategic prowess and innovative spirit. Even in this free version, you are empowered to establish a robust base that serves not just as a shelter, but as your operations center against the backdrop of space's infinite challenges.

Living quarters are just the beginning. Here, you can rest, plan your next moves, and safeguard your collected resources. Energy is a critical aspect of survival, and Astrometica Prologue allows you to harness the power of the cosmos through solar panels. These installations ensure your base remains operational, powering everything from life-support systems to research labs.

A vehicle station adds another layer of depth to your base, serving as a hub for crafting, upgrading, and deploying vehicles essential for exploration and resource collection. It's not just about building a base; it's about creating a foundation for expansion, exploration, and domination of the cosmic frontier.

In Astrometica Prologue, your base is more than a sanctuary—it's a testament to your journey, growth, and resilience in the vastness of space.

🔭 SIGNAL FOLLOWING:

In Astrometica Prologue, your adventure is guided by the pursuit of signals and the exploration of enigmatic territories. Within this free version, two primary types of signals beckon you into the unknown, each promising new discoveries and challenges. These signals might lead you to resource-rich asteroids, abandoned outposts, or reveal new mysteries to unravel within the cosmic expanse.

🚀 SPACE SHIPS:

In Astrometica Prologue, you'll have access to two types of spacecraft, each designed to enhance your exploration and survival in space. First, the fast space bike: sleek, agile, and perfect for quick reconnaissance or darting between asteroids and mysterious islands where gravity binds you to the surface. It's your go-to for speed and efficiency.

The second is a more advanced ship, a versatile vessel equipped not only for travel but survival. It serves as a mobile base of sorts, providing a crucial source of oxygen and basic protection against the harshness of space. This ship is ideal for longer voyages, offering safety and sustenance as you delve deeper into the unknown of Astrometica Prologue.

Your space survival odyssey is about to commence. The cosmos await you in Astrometica: Prologue - are you ready to venture into the unknown? 🚀

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5-3570K 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: i9-9900K 3.6 GHz 8 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Astrometica: Prologue is the free game about surviving in space. You need to use your skills and tools to stay alive. There are many challenges to face, and you need to fight to survive. You also need to build a new base in space.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, German, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
